summary: A 12 year old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.
cast: Jason Behr|Elias Koteas|Rhona Mitra|Natassia Malthe|Kim Coates|Sarah Carter|Tom Jackson|Matthew Knight|Rogue Johnston|Barbara Gordon|Shawn Roberts|Lyriq Bent|Christine Brubaker|Roman Podhora|Wayne Ward|Scott Anderson|Caroline Mangosing|Ramona Pringle|Everton Lawrence|Patrizia Quas|James Kirchner|Jessica Huras|Matt Hopkins|Jasmin Geljo|Charmaine Hamp|David Sparrow|Carl Marotte|Todd Schroeder|Tig Fong|L.J. Vasilantonakis|Wayne Downer|Derek Kealey|Wendy Crewson|Wesley French|Julian Richings
title: El poder de la sangre
